pr_title: [ML] add default inference config to lang ident model

timeline.message: [ML] add default inference config to lang ident model

timeline.bodyText: @sophiec20 I am open to better suggestions here.
timeline.author: benwtrent

replies.bodyText:
The string INFERENCE_CANNOT_DELETE_MODEL is named generically as if the the message could apply to any model but it is strictly about ml models.
I see it is only used in one place but can you rename to INFERENCE_CANNOT_DELETE_*ML*_MODEL or something pls.
Suggestions:
"... as it is managed by machine learning"
replies.author: davidkyle

replies.bodyText: Suggest Cannot delete built-in model [{0}] as it is required by machine learning
replies.author: sophiec20
